other_tests.findings: Progressive sinus bradycardia with PR-interval prolongation and Wenckebach atrioventricular block.
other_tests.changes_over_time: A ventricular pacemaker was implanted, and there were no further symptoms over a 1-year follow-up.

other_tests.findings: Patients with blood-injury phobia showed an initial rise in heart rate followed by marked vasovagal slowing.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The slow response often culminated in fainting, but habituation occurred with exposure.
